name: Bubble Shooter Christmas Edition
description:
Craziest most fun casual puzzle shooting game Bubble Bobble for this Christmas.
Bubble Shooter together, playing bubble, eliminate bubbles, Bubble Bubble waiting for you to praise with Christmas features. SANTA will play with you to shoot the bubble.
The more bubbles you destroy with a single click, the higher your score will be.
Bubble Breaker involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
Bubble Shooter seems easy but hard to master.
It also involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast shoot action.
Casual but adventure and fantastic Christmas game.
***********************Features***************
- Lovely Christmas scene with beautiful Festive music in bubble game.
- The classic mode brand-new design, level continuously updated, through constant!
- Mutilple levels mission target to challenge
- Relaxes you when you are at home or at anywhere.
- Real physical collision effect, beautiful game screen, the perfect game experience.
Please email us if you have any advice.
we will appreciate that if you give us a five rate.
